settings.heading: Print & Frame Specs
settings.content:
The Iconic Archival Collection is a luxury print edition. Both Unframed and Framed Prints are Giclée printed on 250gsm Satin Lustre paper.

Framed Prints are archivally mounted with a 7cm Matboard border and framed in a high quality, sustainable Australian timber. The timber frame is 4cm in depth and has a 2cm face reveal. 

Framed Canvas are Giclée printed on 350gsm matte satin canvas and framed in our signature Canvas Float Frame. This specialty moulding has a 7mm face reveal and allows an elegant shadow line between the canvas and the frame. Canvas are printed 'edge to edge', with the image meeting the edge of the canvas.

Framed Prints and Canvas are supplied ready to hang.

settings.heading: Sizing
settings.content:
** Sizes listed in the above drop-down are based on the IMAGE size. Please carefully read the table below to see the finished size of your chosen product before making your selection **

If you require a custom size let us know as everything we produce is made to order, by hand, and is printed and framed in-house.

settings.heading: Shipping
settings.content:
All our products are made to order and have a production time of between 5-14 working days not including delivery. Please be aware, as all our products are made to order, turnaround time can be subject to delays related to availability of materials. 

Print orders ship approximately 5 business days from the order date.

Frame orders ship approximately 14 business days from the order date. Don't hesitate to contact us if your order is time sensitive and we will do our best to accommodate.

Transit Times:*

Metro Areas within Australia: 1-3 business days

Non-Metro Areas within Australia: 3-10 business days

International: contact our team


Packaging:
Posters, photographs and art prints are carefully rolled with protective paper to protect against dust before being packaged in a tube. 

Framed items and Canvas items are first bubble wrapped then placed in cardboard shipping carton custom fit to each order.

Tracking:
As soon as your order is dispatched, you will receive a confirmation email that includes a tracking number. Tracking is not provided for international standard shipments. All orders will be labelled with an Authority to Leave notice.

settings.heading: Click & Collect
settings.content:
Frame orders take approximately 14 business days to complete, whilst Print orders take around 5 business days. On completion, you will be notified by our team that your order is ready to collect.

Please be aware, as all our products are made to order, turnaround time can be subject to delays related to availability of materials. 

Don't hesitate to contact us if your order is time sensitive and we will do our best to accommodate.
